title: Cable and X-Force Vol. 1: Wanted (Trade Paperback)
description: Cable is back! With a new X-Force at his side, he must tackle the threats nobody else can know about — even if it makes him and his team Public Enemy No. 1. Just who are Cable’s new recruits? Where has Colossus been since AVENGERS VS. X-MEN, and what’s wrong with his powers? What will happen when Cable faces his foster daughter, Hope, the “savior” of AVX? And most important, why is the new X-Force attacking a civilian company? Caught red-handed at the scene of a terrorist attack on a major American corporation whose CEO has expressed anti-mutant views, the members of X-Force finds themselves branded criminals and on the run —with none other than the Uncanny Avengers in hot pursuit. There’s no going back NOW! Collecting CABLE AND X-FORCE #1-5 and material from MARVEL NOW! POINT ONE #1.
